r.d: This module let you control your local coin acceptor, using a serial connection and the simple management protocol. This module supports 4 slot coin acceptors using the ABCD method to control them.
r.n: Some cleanups and bug fixes, added config file ca_config.h for multiple ca's, added ca_prom_get() ca_convert() (hex2long, bin2hex, hex2bin conversion), changed initializer
